page.text: The wolfy ruffian pants, cheeks flushed as its all she can do to stand tall and keep her hands at her sides and not digging in to seek out the source of that wet spot on her pants. She's putting her best efforts into not succumbing to her animal needs, but its more adorable than effective.

choice.text: Cute, but not what I'm here for, moving on

page.text: You have devoured your prey in some unspecified, unelaborated on yet satisfying way.
